section.title: Welcome to GST Taxation
section.content: Welcome to GST Taxation Sam Waterston SVP of Taxation, Law and Order
Did You Spot the Problem? Potential Estate Tax Exposure = $1,350,000 Proper planning could totally eliminate the exposure
Clients are often blind to their estate planning needs Your job is to help them see! But you cannot show them what you cannot see yourself
This course will help you to: Recognize the needs associated with: Estate taxes Gift taxes Generation gifting Transfer taxes Related income tax issues Gain practical application skills with clients
Applying the marital deduction to everything is not always optimal because: It can increase the tax liability in the second death The power to “shelter” assets in the first estate is lost.

Result: $2,000,000 excluded from taxation Balance is subject to 45% estate tax AND 45% GST tax Grandchildren receive $2,200,000 after taxes A Preferable Plan $2,000,000 to the grandchildren free of GST tax Balance of $1,100,000 to the children (after the estate tax)
What you should learn about the GST Tax: Avoid this tax! Learn how to identify skip persons Learn to recognize events that can trigger the tax
